revised_title: Exploring Hybrid Vigour in Plant Breeding and Its Applications
tldr: The article discusses the concept of hybrid vigour in plant breeding, which refers to the beneficial effects on yield and quality of domestic plants. Hybrid vigour can be achieved through various methods, including the use of inbred lines and cross-pollination. The author highlights the importance of balancing yield, vigour, and uniformity in crop improvement and the potential benefits of using hybrid vigour in plant breeding for better phenotypic stability and performance.
